title: Cannot save a Car
description: Error occurs when attempting to save a car record.

title: Login button not responsive
description: User interface issue where the login button is not clickable.

title: Missing product images
description: Product images are not displayed on the product details page.

title: Payment processing error
description: Error occurs during payment processing, preventing transactions.

title: Database connection timeout
description: Application fails to establish a connection to the database.

title: Incorrect billing address validation
description: Incorrect validation logic for billing addresses, causing errors during checkout.

title: Can't delete the car
description: User is unable to delete a car record from the system.

title: Email notifications not being sent
description: Email notifications fail to send to users upon specific events.

title: Slow page loading times
description: Pages take an unusually long time to load, affecting user experience.

title: File upload failing
description: File uploads fail to complete successfully, interrupting user tasks.
